positions.title: Phd. student
positions.description: I obtained my Phd degree in theoretical mathematics (specifically Operator Algebra) based on my thesis with the title "Regularity of C*-algebras and central sequence algebras"

name: Nuuday
description: Both back-end and front-end development in a number of cross-functional agile teams.

description.headline: B2B mobile voice subscriptions (for TDC Erhverv).
description.details: Mainly back-end in Java/Kotlin and Spring (Boot). Towards the end a bit of front-end in React (typescript). Initally an open-pages shop for new customers (now closed), later self-service for enterprise solutions.

description.headline: B2C TV subscriptions sales (YouSee).
description.details: Front-end in React (javascript) with Redux and Rxjs, hosted in a hacked SiteCore set-up with content in JSON files. An open pages shop for TV subscriptions handling both new and existing customers.

description.headline: B2C mobile voice subscription sales (YouSee).
description.details: Front-end in React (javascript) with redux-bees, hosted on AWS with content from a mix of legacy PHP back-end and JSON files. An open pages shop for mobile voice subscriptions (and phone bundles) and up/down-grades for existing customers.
